Year Level Guides for North Brisbane & Moreton Bay

What to expect at each school stage, from early primary through senior years. Academic expectations, developmental milestones, and support options for every family.

In this section:

  • What to Expect in the Early Years of Primary School?

    An overview of the first years of primary education, focusing on social and academic development.

  • How Can Parents Support Learning in Years 3-6?

    Guidance for parents on supporting children in middle primary school with reading, maths, and study habits.

  • What Happens in Secondary School (Years 7-10)?

    An overview of the secondary school experience, including subjects, assessments, and extracurricular activities.

  • Navigating the Senior Years (Years 11-12)

    Guidance on the final years of schooling, focusing on pathways, exams, and future planning.

  • Preparing for the Transition to High School

    Information on the changes and challenges when moving from primary to secondary school.
